articles.title: See tense situation outside last Mississippi abortion clinic after ruling - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN's Nadia Romero reports from outside the last abortion clinic in Mississippi after the Supreme Court overturned Roe v. Wade, which established a constitutional right to have an abortion. Mississippi has a trigger law that will ban nearly all abortions and …

articles.title: CNN commentator challenged on her religion and abortion stance. See her response - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN political commentator Alice Stewart questioned Ana Navarro's stance on abortion, prompting an emotional reply from Navarro.

articles.author: Jessie Yeung, Mayumi Maruyama, James Frater and Niamh Kennedy, CNN
articles.title: Oslo shooting near gay bar investigated as terrorism, as Pride parade is canceled
articles.description: Oslo's annual Pride parade was canceled on Saturday following a deadly shooting at a gay bar that Norwegian police are investigating as a possible terrorist attack.

articles.author: Aya Elamroussi, CNN
articles.title: More protests expected this weekend amid fury and anguish over the Supreme Court's abortion ruling
articles.description: The seismic ruling by the US Supreme Court to eliminate the federal constitutional right to an abortion has roiled the country, fueling protests that began Friday and that are expected to extend throughout the weekend.

articles.title: Video: See Planned Parenthood leader's response to Liz Cheney Supreme Court tweet - CNN Video
articles.description: Planned Parenthood Federation of America President and CEO Alexis McGill Johnson reacts to a tweet from Republican Rep. Liz Cheney on the Supreme Court ruling overturning Roe v. Wade.

articles.author: Jeffrey Toobin
articles.title: Opinion: What Clarence Thomas is going to do now
articles.description: Thomas has always done his work with admirable candor. He tells us where the Court is headed. With five conservative justices on the bench, we should take him at his word, writes Jeffrey Toobin.

articles.author: Joan Biskupic, CNN legal analyst & Supreme Court biographer
articles.title: Analysis: Conservative justices seized the moment and delivered the opinion they'd long promised
articles.description: The five-justice Supreme Court bloc that overturned a half century of women's abortion rights on Friday had coalesced less than two years. But they had found their moment and they seized it.

articles.title: Biden will sign first major federal gun safety legislation in decades on Saturday, White House says
